title: How big is your App?
description: It´s all about the number of main features imagined

options.title: Small
options.description: Your app probably has around 4-5 key feature pages (excluding any static content, sign in, sign up etc.)

options.title: Medium
options.description: Your app probably has around 6-9 key feature pages (excluding any static content, sign in, sign up etc.)

options.title: Pequeno
options.description: Your app probably has around 10-15 key feature pages (excluding any static content, sign in, sign up etc.)

title: What level of UI would you like?
description: How much effort do you plan to expend on UX, Desing and other Visual Features

options.title: MVP
options.description: Minimum Viable Product. Very raw but functional, no UI designer required.

options.title: Basic
options.description: Still quite basic but pleasing to the eye, perhaps using purchased template.

options.title: Polished
options.description: Professional bespoke UI design. May also have some animations and transitions etc.
